# quinn.myopia

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of quinn.myopia is to explore the article
"Myopia and ambient lighting at night"
by Graham E. Quinn, Chai H. Shin, Maureen G. Maguire & Richard A. Stone 
in Nature volume 399, pages 113â€“114 (1999)
<https://doi.org/10.1038/20094>



## Installation

You can install the development version of quinn.myopia from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("d-morrison/quinn.myopia")
```
